critical_workflows: Core Program Navigation and Progress Tracking

test_scenarios.name: Successful User Registration and Onboarding
steps: Click on 'Get Started' or equivalent CTA.
Enter valid personal information (email, demographics, etc.) in the registration form.
Accept Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
Verify email address via confirmation link sent to the provided email.
Successfully log in to the Omada Health platform.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully registered, email is verified, and user is logged into the Omada Health platform with a personalized dashboard.

test_scenarios.name: Navigate to Core Program Content and Track Progress
steps: Log in to the Omada Health platform with valid credentials.
Navigate to the core program content section (e.g., lessons, activities, group forums).
Mark a lesson or activity as 'complete'.
Navigate back to the main dashboard.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User can successfully navigate to and view core program content. Progress is accurately tracked and reflected on the dashboard.
